attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My husband died in 2006.  He was found by my 14 yr old son and 10 yr old daughter who now suffer from depression as do i.  

I have worked since i was 16 and only took 6 months  off after he died.

All I wanted to do was care for my children but the money was barely enough to live on. With no absent father to claim maintenance from I had to return to work which has had an impact on my childrens and my own health.

I just want to be a MUM. Not everyones circumstances are the same!!!!

rejection.details: For individual cases please contact the Department for Work & Pensions directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
